00051             Nearest = CV_INTER_NN,
00052             Bilineal = CV_INTER_LINEAR,
00053             AreaResampling = CV_INTER_AREA,
00054             Bicubic = CV_INTER_CUBIC

00058         enum Depth {
00059             UByte = IPL_DEPTH_8U,
00060             SByte = IPL_DEPTH_8S,
00061             UShort = IPL_DEPTH_16U,
00062             SShort = IPL_DEPTH_16S,
00063             SLong = IPL_DEPTH_32S,
00064             Float32 = IPL_DEPTH_32F,
00065             Float64 = IPL_DEPTH_64F

00071             GrayToColor = CV_GRAY2BGR,
00072             ColorToHSV = CV_BGR2HSV,
00073             HSVToColor = CV_HSV2BGR,
00074             ColorToYUV = CV_BGR2YCrCb,

00116             inline CvSize size() const { return cvSize(m_image->width, m_image->height); }

00118             inline int height() const { return m_image->height; }
00120             inline int depth() const { return m_image->depth; }
